channel.title: mental health on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in mental health on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.12: DMT, The Discovery of Dro"gen Hasen Weg and the Super Extreme Moon
item.description: 18th March, 2011 Hello everyone, I watched this video recently. http://www.esoterictube.com/dmt-the-spirit-molecule.html It corresponds with what Joseph Campbell says about the spiritual world (as represented by myths and anecdotes from those who meditate, and shamans), drugs and psychological diseases like schizophrenia.

item.title: A Sleep Deprived Mind
item.description: I woke up early and worked all day. Had very little lunch but instead of eating dinner at eight pm as I normally do, I went to sing with my friends until around eleven thirty in the night.

item.title: Boosting Mental Health services in India
item.description: I attended a lecture on CBT- Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and how it is being made accessible in Scotland. Check the website below. http://www.livinglifetothefull.com/index.php?section=page&page_seq=13 Can we bring this to India?
